fulltext:
HOANG DUC NHUAN 
I want to utilize my skills and potential to achieve the challenging position in the Software Industry and fulfilling organizational 
goals. 
CORE QUALIFICATIONS 
 
4 years of experience with MEAN, MERN stack and 1 year of experience React Native 
 
Has hand-on experience in Development and maintainance the front end and back end 
functionality of website 
 
Proficiency using Javascript, HTML, CSS 
 
Have ability to use VueJs 
 
Designed and implemented database 
 
Good consultative and communication skills 
 
Attention to detail and ability to work with teams 
 
Quick learner and hard-working individual 
 
Devops: Setup docker, set up CI, deploy to server 
SKILLS 
Languages: Javascript, HTML, CSS 
Frontend: Angular Js, React Js, Vue Js 
Backend: Node Js (Express, Koa, Meteor) 
Databases: Mongo DB 
Operating System: Window, Linux, MacOS 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Dongbat Software Solutions and Services 
Web developer, June 2015 – November 2017 
 
Develop the Web Application using NodeJs and AngularJs 
 
Development and implementation of Core functionality and support tools. 
 
Understand the business and functional requirements. 
Sotatek 
Web developer, March 2018 – Now 
 
To help build web application and mobile application 
 
Fullstack developer using NodeJs, ReactJs, React Native, VueJs 
PROJECTS 
Temporary import and re-export containers surveillance system 
From June 2015 to May 2016 
Customer 
General Department of Vietnam Customs 
Description 
A tracker device (Arknav CT-X8) is installed on each Temporary import and re-
export container and sending the GPS and other data to a centralized server. 
The customs agents can monitor the track and receive notification (web, email, 
SMS) every time the containers have suspicious signs (going out of predefined 
track/fence, going too fast, stopping for too long). Can be used as a web 
application and mobile application. 
My position 
Developer 
My responsibilities 
Responsible for the development of following modules: 
- 
Trip history viewer 
- 
Hierarchical access control 
Responsible for perfomance tune up of heavy lifting modules 
Technologies used 
NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDb, AngularJs 
Cash-in-transit Van Surveillance 
From February 2016 to March 2016 
Customer 
NGS JSC 
Description 
In this project, instead of using a GPS seal, they use a GPS-enabled RFID lock. 
The system must be able to open/close the lock remotely according to the 
predefined rules. The surveillance module was similar to the containers 
surveillance system but was developed from the ground up 
My position 
Developer 
My responsibilities 
Responsible for the development of following modules: 
- 
TCP Server 
- 
Web interface 
- 
Remote control 
Technologies used 
NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDb, AngularJs 
Centralized control system 
From June 2016 to December 2016 
Customer 
Vietnam Military of Defense – High tech research and development center 
Description 
Development of a web portal to integrate with HP Network Element 
Management System, development of several management services. 
My position 
Developer 
My responsibilities 
Responsible for the development of modules: 
- 
API gateway (Allow developers to deploy, manage, test their API) 
- 
HP NMS North bound interface consumption 
Technologies used 
NodeJs, AngularJs, Java, Oracle DB 
LotteryWorld.us 
From October 2016 to December 2016 
Customer 
BKA Team 
Description 
LotteryWorld is an established service for lottery fans wishing to play the 
richest games from around the world 
My position 
Developer 
My responsibilities 
Responsible for the development of core modules: 
- 
Check winning tickets 
- 
Administrator’s functions 
- 
Implement the design 
- 
Hierarchical access control 
Technologies used 
Meteor Js, Docker, MongoDB 
Zehitomo.com 
From March  2017 to November 2017 
Customer 
Zehitomo  team (K.K. JAM Group) 
Description 
Zehitomo is a web based platform that connects Tokyo’s best local service 
professionals with clients looking to hire them. 
My position 
Developer 
My responsibilities 
- 
Refactor old modules 
- 
Add new features 
- 
Help testing system 
- 
Give solutions for improvement system 
Technologies used 
Nodejs,  Angular 1, MongoDB, ReactJs, VueJs 
OBS Deephi 
From March 2018 to May 2018 
Customer 
OBS Korea 
Description 
OBS Deephi is a DICOM viewer web application based on OHIF opensource. 
My position 
Fullstack developer 
My responsibilities 
- 
Upgrade to version 2.0 (Add MPR function) 
Technologies used 
MeteorJs, MongoDB

Sotatek

Sotatek
